title: Motorcycle Insurance Plan
terms_and_conditions: This comprehensive motorcycle insurance policy provides full protection for your motorcycle. The policy includes liability coverage with minimum limits of $50,000 per person, $100,000 per accident for bodily injury, and $25,000 for property damage. Collision coverage protects your motorcycle from accident damage with a deductible of $750. Comprehensive coverage covers theft, vandalism, fire, and weather-related damage with the same $750 deductible. Uninsured motorist coverage is included with limits matching your liability coverage. The policy includes medical payments coverage of $10,000 per person for medical expenses resulting from motorcycle accidents. Accessories and custom parts are covered up to $3,000. The policy includes roadside assistance and towing services for breakdowns and accidents. Coverage is valid for all riders listed on the policy who are licensed motorcycle operators. The policy covers motorcycles, scooters, and mopeds. Exclusions include racing, stunts, and use on closed tracks. Coverage does not apply if the motorcycle is used for commercial delivery services. The policy requires proper licensing and safety gear compliance. Coverage for motorcycles over 15 years old may have limited comprehensive benefits. The policy includes a discount for completion of motorcycle safety courses. Coverage is valid throughout the United States. The policy does not cover damage from normal wear and tear or mechanical failures.
